MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Prion, Peniel and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a faulty piece of equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:48PM on 23rd February 2021.
